name: office-add-in-shared-runtime-global-data
title: Share global data with a shared runtime
shortDescription: Shows how to set up an Office Add-in project that uses the shared runtime.
longDescription: Shows how to set up a project that uses the shared runtime. The shared runtime runs all parts of the Excel add-in (ribbon buttons, task pane, and custom functions) in a single browser runtime. This makes it easy to share data through local storage, or through global variables.

thumbnails.alt: Add-in task pane with controls to set or get global variables in the solution.

references.name: Configure your Office Add-in to use a shared runtime
references.description: You can configure your Office Add-in to run all of its code in a single shared runtime. This enables better coordination across your add-in and access to the DOM and CORS from all parts of your add-in.
